title: Scrolling
content:
As soon as I touch the mouse wheel to scroll up or down, it jumps to the bottom right cell of the page and won't go anywhere else. It's been doing it for a few days and I can't figure out what is wrong. It's this way in every sheet I have. Mouse works fine in every other program. I'm using Firefox, Win 10. There are several persons complaining about this.

Any ideas what is the problem?
creator: annie22

title: Unable to view streams/YouTube quality issues
content: Hi all, I've been having this issue for a while. I am unable to view streams on YouTube or Twitch (Twitch will show streams as offline, whereas YouTube will not even show streams), and I have encountered a new issue where YouTube allows only 360p on videos. I have used the HTML5 Video Capability Test and seem to have an issue in that department (images attached). Even in troubleshooting mode, the issue persists. Any help is appreciated.
creator: zephyrvalkyrie

title: Browser tab active no longer indicated
content: Any longer nothing shows which browser tab is active. I have to click around on the tabs to find which one is active -- I can no longer tell just by looking.
creator: JoeJupa
